title: "You're guaranteed one of your selected roles during your promo series" YAAASSS
body:
I know im no fan of the way riot conducts themselves in regards to managing league, and i have plenty of bad things to say about them.

But for once they did something that atleast lets me take a notch off my hatestick.

My biggest gripe with autofill was simply that most of the time it would fill you as support or jungle, and being someone who plays carry lanes to well carry, that can get quite annoying when you go from a nightmare fuel roaming akali one game, to a helpless support the next hoping to god that your adc knows how to right click.

So having that extra bit of security that i wont lose my promos from sheer rng via the autofill system is a step in the right direction.

And before anyone is like "hurr durr why not just get gud and learn to play other lanes" the only role im not confident in is jungle and thats because its my least played role, i dont like bot lane not because i cant play it, but because i have to rely on someone else namely my lane partner, that human factor, the unknown variable, thats why i dont play it.

If im adc i have to entrust my life to my support and hope to god they know when to engage and blow cd's and when to peel, and if im support i have to hope to god that the adc knows how to position for when i engage to blow cd's (so the adc can follow up safely) and wont get caught out so often that i dont always have stuff off cd to peel him/her.

little off topic rant aside.

Cudos for finally making a decision that doesnt make me spit the dummy rito.

That's why I usually just support carry now, even in game modes that don't have lanes. http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/y3y9Hcgn-aram-team-serious-aram-players-only?comment=0009 Dunnoh why some of the pics are down though :L

Because like half the player base is down here and none of them want to play support, because its full of either players like me who want the fuck out of bronze so will only play hard carry lanes.

And players like well bronzies who think they are the hero of the game and want to feel all anime and shit, they usually play yas mid or something.

silver alone is what top 50% of the playbase, 45% something stupid.

As i keep saying riot has a downward trend built into their mmr calculations, but thats a discussion for another day.

> who think they are the hero of the game and want to feel all anime and shit

This made my day.
Its too bloody true though haha.
Yes the same, made my day to.

I am a bronze support/jungle/fill main, mostly support and I am the hero of the game when I play zilean and be all like haha nope my teammates ain't dying today, not while I'm around, here have this aoe stun on a 3s cooldown that chunks half your hp and sets you upto to be finished by my goon squad. Too bad my teammates ban zilean when they see me about to pick him or my adc goes afk.

Lately I've been picking up thresh, lulu and morgana though since they're more meta and I won't get reported for a troll support pick so much. I'm trying to expand my support roster now since I can play alistair, soraka, blitzcrank, sona and janna. I like being able to play with supports that compliment the team pick (especially ap damage supports for when my team is all ad, tank supports for when we don't have a tank or engage supports for when I feel bored) though I'm getting rusty with alistair so I might need to revisit him and finish off his m6.

Rule no.1 of mage supports, is if your damage isn't bigger than the sum of the adc and midlaner (despite you only having assist gold, remember you have base damage, stack cdr and mana and harass in lane constantly so your damage should be massive) you are a disappointment to the role.

Rule no.1 of tank supports, if you don't have at least 5x as many assists as deaths and you aren't tanking all the enemy big cds and damage without dying, you should be trying harder and picking better engages.

Rule no.1 of supports in general, but a sightstone and make sure that you know where the enemies are at all times and that you clear all the important routes of wards.
This guaranteed pick stuff is great. As a support main who went through promos yesterday I was very glad I got support both games! ; )
